articles.title: Pre-Christmas rush begins in Sydney property market - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: In Sydney 76 per cent of the 776 properties scheduled for auction sold on Saturday, while in Melbourne 68 per cent of 480 homes sold under the hammer.
articles.content: Sydney-based buyer's agent Rich Harvey bought the property at 24 Meridian Close, which has several living spaces and a home office, on behalf of his banker clients who were looking for more space, an… [+3269 chars]
